events.id: Loyalty Available: Garrus or Secured Loyalty: Thane
Completed: Overlord: Vulcan and Prometheus Stations

events.description: Refused to give Veetor to Cerberus.

Completing the four available dossiers (excluding DLC Kasumi and Zaeed) triggers Horizon. 

You may want to do choose other assignments if you want to raise your experience first.

You have completed the four dossiers. 

The next time you return to the Normandy, you will be diverted to Horizon.
Acquire 8 Squad members (DLC Characters count) and 5 more assignments.
Warning: after you complete five more missions and acquire 8 squad memebers, you will be diverted to the Collector Ship.
Warning: you can only complete 2 missions, or all the squad loyalty missions, after Reaper IFF before the Normandy is attacked by the Collectors.
